subject: Order inquiry
description_text:
Hello,
when will the goods be shipped according to my order No. SSN4517 from 
December 7? The goods should have been delivered within 2+15 days from 
ordering and paying for the goods. Please fulfill the delivery according to 
my order. Please also provide information on the current status.

Please reply to my email.

Best regards, Pavel Skovajsa

conversations.body_text: Hi Pavel Skovajsa,  Your other item was originally scheduled to ship from our German warehouse, but due to the large volume of shipments, the delivery time was later than expected. The goods are now back in the warehouse, and we are processing the truck and arranging for DHL Express shipment. The tracking number will be provided tomorrow.
